timeline.author: Zidane
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -72,30 +73,52 @@ */ Optional get(T type); - /** - * Gets the identifier for the given {@code type T} from the mapping. If the - * {@code type T} is not yet registered in the mapping then it is registered and - * given the next available identifier. - * - * @param type The type - * @return The identifier - */ - int getOrAssign(T type); - - /** - * Removes the given {@code type T} from the mapping. - * - *

Note that if this palette is considered a global palette, removal is not supported.

- * - * @param type The type to remove - * @return If the type existed in the mapping - */ - boolean remove(T type); /** * Gets all {@code type T}s contained in this palette. * * @return All contained types */ - Collection getEntries(); + Stream getEntries();

timeline.message:
Modify Palette to return OptionalInts

Previously, we used Optional<Integer> because of
a use of representing the value being not belonging
of a registry or something thereof, instead, it's
better to return the actual OptionalInt that will
remain unboxed as a value.

Signed-off-by: Gabriel Harris-Rouquette <gabizou@me.com>

Introduce more generic Palettes

Signed-off-by: Gabriel Harris-Rouquette <gabizou@me.com>

Introduce more generic Palettes
